card.name: Ultimate Dragon
card.text: ■ This creature gets +5000 power for each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race. ■ Crew breaker—Dragon ''(This creature breaks one more shield for each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race.)''

card.name: Lupia Lapia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Your Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put it into your mana zone instead. If you do, you may return a Dragon from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Whirlwind Tailspin
card.text: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon may cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1. When you put that creature into the battle zone, it gets "speed attacker" until the End Step
